title: Himi 385
lyrics:
M.NG. loua
Ko e Tohi Fakaha 7:9-15
1.
Ko hai he fu’u kakai ko ia hange ha matatau
He afe laui afe ia, he tokolahi fau?
‘Oku nau nofo ofi he taloni he ‘Otua,
‘I he fa’ahinga fulipē ‘oku nau mu’omu’a.
2.
‘Oku nau kofu hina ē mo to’o ha va’akau,
‘O hangē ko ha ‘eiki kuo foki mei he tau?
‘Oku nau tātākalo pē ‘a e fu’u ‘akau ko ia;
Kae fonu pē ‘a e langi ‘i he’enau fiefia?
3.
Ko hai ‘a e fu’u kakai ko ia, pea nau ha’u mei fē?
He kāinga na’e mo’ua ‘i he fu’u mamahi pē.
Kae ‘ikai te nau tuka, ka nau vili pe ke a’u;
Ko ‘eni kuo lava, he kalauni kuo ma’u.
4.
He pani ‘uli fōfō, he ta’etaau ange fau,
He ‘amanaki heli, he fa’ahinga kuo pau,
Nau ‘ilo ki he Lami ē mo hono ta’ata’a,
Nau fō pe honau kofu ‘i he toto fakama’a.
5.
Ko hono ō pe ia ‘oku nau ‘i langi ē,
‘O to’o ha va’a paame ko e kau ikuna pē,
‘O tauhi ki he ‘Eiki ‘i he ‘aho mo e pō.
‘O ofi he taloni ‘i he kāinga ‘āngelo.
6.
Na’e
ngāue
ki he ‘Eiki ‘a e kau ‘āngelo ko ia,
Kae ‘ikai hanau kaunga ‘i he’ene ongosia.
Mo’oni pē ‘a e tohi, tau kātaki fiefia,
Ka kau ‘i he mamahi, te tau pule pē mo ia.*
